                                                    Opposite to St Annes college and opposite to upcoming NDR mall.

                                                    Make your dream home in the heart of Madhavaram, Chennai with this stunning 3 BHK apartment for sale in the upscale Casagrand Builder Northern Star. Situated on the 12th level of a modern building, this property offers a perfect blend of comfort, elegance, and accessibility, which is perfect for families seeking an elite lifestyle.Property SpecificationsThis large 3 BHK apartment is semi-furnished, with necessary wardrobes in all three bedrooms for maximum storage. The whole apartment is designed with classy vitrified tiles, ensuring a classy and contemporary appearance all over. The design features three well-proportioned bedrooms, the master bedroom and Bedroom 1 having attached bathrooms, and a third common bathroom for visitors. All of the bathrooms are designed in a modern Western style.One of the attractions of this apartment is the balcony, which is connected to the living room and gives a nice view of the side road, and there is fresh air and sunshine available. The semi-modular kitchen has cabinets and a tall unit, which gives great functionality to cook and prepare meals. Since it is designed to be North facing, there are no Vaastu problems, and it ensures a peaceful living space.FacilitiesCasagrand Builder Northern Star residents have an abundance of amenities to live in style. The complex comprises over 30 amenities, such as a clubhouse, party hall, swimming pool, gym, golf simulator, mini theater, and an open theater. Sports enthusiasts can indulge in tennis courts, basketball courts, and a terrace cricket area.Kids will enjoy the play area, while grown-ups can relax in the fountain rest area or do yoga in the specific yoga garden. The flat also features 1 covered car parking space, providing easy access to your car. To ensure your safety and well-being, the property has CCTV surveillance and a 247 security staff, guaranteeing a secure living environment.LocalityLocated at a prime area of Madhavaram, this apartment boasts all the required facilities within its reach. Schools such as St. Annes College, St. Annes Primary School, and GreenField Chennai International School nearby increase the value of the area. Medical facilities are within walking distance of Meridian Hospital and KVT Multi-Speciality Hospital. It is convenient to shop with the upcoming NDR Mall, D Mart, and local markets nearby.Transport is easily accessible, with the bus stop just opposite the gate and the Madhavaram Bus Terminus being only 5 minutes away. The proposed Madhavaram Metro Station will provide additional connectivity, and Perambur Railway Station is 4 km away, providing easy connectivity to the remainder of the city.

The flooring is finished with mosaic tiles, adding a touch of elegance to the interiors. This freehold property provides full ownership and long-term investment value.FacilitiesThe apartment offers essential amenities including a lift and covered parking. Its semi-furnished condition gives buyers the flexibility to personalize the interiors. The flat overlooks the main road, ensuring good accessibility and visibility.LocalityAlwartirunagar is a well-connected and developed neighborhood in West Chennai. The property is situated near Inox Theatre, Virugambakkam, with easy access to schools, shopping centers, and public transportation, making it ideal for families seeking a convenient urban lifestyle.

                                                    Explore this spacious 3 BHK house in the calm and well-connected neighborhood of Kolapakkam, Chennai. Designed for comfortable family living, the home features well-ventilated rooms and lovely interiors. Property Specifications This intricately designed G+2 residential home has a huge carpet area of 2000 sq.ft and is also fully furnished. It is very close to Omega International School and Saraswati Vidya Mandir and hence is perfect for families seeking a ready-to-move-in property in a gated complex. The house is Vaastu compliant with an east-facing door.Ground floor comprises 2 car parking areas, 1 covered, a borewell of 220 ft and an EB meter box. The first floor comprises cozy seating with 1 bedroom, 1 shared western-type bathroom equipped with geyser and fitted to solar power, a chimney-fitted modular kitchen, living cum dining room, and a road-facing balcony.The second level has 2 bedrooms with an attached western-style bathroom and geyser points (solar-powered), 2 dressing rooms, and 2 balconies that are opened up to lovely green views. The property also has a utility area abutting the kitchen, providing the convenience of functional everyday living.Interiors are carefully planned with walk-in closets, TV unit, pooja unit, shoe rack, lighting, fans, and false ceilings in all the rooms, including the balcony. Some of the added features are mosquito netted windows, smart sink, and smart lock system, providing both convenience and security. Flooring is done in classy vitrified tiles and the terrace has a beautiful garden area that provides a green corner in your home to breathe fresh.FacilitiesBasic facilities are 24-hour water supply, 100% power backup, solar panels, a security officer, and CCTV monitoring all over the complex. The house is in a safe gated community that has a stormwater harvesting system. You also have the luxury of access to facilities like a clubhouse, temple, and well-manicured park.LocalityIn location, the house is well linked with public transport facilities such as buses and autos. The main services such as hospitals, malls, supermarkets, banks, and ATMs are all within 1 km. The rail station is just within 2 km from here.

The property does not offer 100 power backup, and there are no additional society amenities. The villa is semifurnished with kitchen fittings and one wardrobe are there. The villa enjoys excellent connectivity to public transport, including buses linking Tambaram, Vandalur, OMR Road, and Guduvancherry. The proximity to key highways and educational and healthcare facilities makes this villa a practical and desirable option for families seeking a balance of convenience, comfort, and modern living.This 3 BHK semifurnished villa in Sriperumbudur combines spacious interiors, strategic location, and functional design, making it an ideal choice for homeowners seeking a wellrounded residence in Chennai Rathinamangalam.

The home is North-facing and built using red brick walls on all four sides, ensuring strong structural durability. Additional features include a private terrace, separate borewell, separate overhead tank, Jaguar fittings, fall ceiling with LED strip lights and even provision for an internal lift.FacilitiesThe property offers excellent essential services, including 24-hour water supply, 100 power backup, and the presence of a security guard within this gated community. It includes two covered parking spaces for convenience. The independent villa setup offers privacy along with modern comforts.LocalitySituated in Kolapakkam, Chennai, this house enjoys the advantage of being set on a 40-ft main road, offering easy connectivity and a convenient approach. The locality is well-developed with access to everyday amenities such as shops, schools, healthcare centres and recreational facilities. As part of an independent gated community, the home ensures a peaceful environment along with community-level safety and comfort.

This prime location perfectly balances the serenity of lakeside living with the convenience of a well-established urban infrastructure, ensuring all lifestyle requirements are met within the immediate vicinity.

The home comprises two bedrooms and two bathrooms, designed for efficient and comfortable daily living. A single balcony faces the main road, allowing natural light and ventilation to flow through the apartment. The layout includes a combined living and dining area that supports a functional and open living experience. The apartment is semi-furnished and features a standard kitchen layout with provision for piped gas connection. Tile flooring throughout the apartment ensures durability and ease of maintenance. The property forms part of a residential society comprising 24 flats and is ready to move, offering immediate possession within a resale development.FacilitiesThe apartment benefits from a continuous 24-hour water supply and is supported by 100 percent power backup, ensuring uninterrupted daily routines. One open parking space is available for residents, adding convenience for vehicle owners. Lift access is provided within the building, supporting ease of movement across floors. Banks, ATMs, and retail conveniences are well distributed throughout the area, supporting a convenient urban lifestyle. With improving infrastructure and accessibility, this locality continues to attract end-users seeking long-term residential value in Chennai.

Its prime location ensures you are never far from the city's top commercial and social attractions.::::Property Specifications::This semi-furnished apartment spans a super built-up area of 917 sq. ft, featuring a thoughtfully planned layout that maximises every inch of space. The residence comprises two spacious bedrooms and two modern bathrooms, tailored to meet the needs of a contemporary lifestyle. The interiors are finished with care, providing a welcoming environment for its future residents. As a resale property, it offers the advantage of immediate possession, allowing you to move in without the wait associated with new developments. The semi-furnished status provides a great foundation, allowing you to add your personal touch to the décor and furnishings.::::Facilities::The property is equipped with essential facilities to ensure a hassle-free living experience. It includes dedicated space for parking, catering to the needs of vehicle owners. Being a builder floor development, it offers a sense of privacy and a close-knit community feel. Residents can enjoy a secure environment with standard utilities readily available. The building’s low-rise structure and first-floor positioning make it easily accessible for all age groups, while the surrounding infrastructure supports a comfortable daily routine with consistent water and electricity services.::::Locality::Velachery is a premier residential neighbourhood in Chennai, celebrated for its exceptional connectivity and comprehensive social infrastructure. The property is exceptionally well-located, with the Velachery Metro Railway station just 0.6 km away and the Velachery Railway Station 0.8 km away, making commutes effortless. Families will benefit from the proximity to prestigious institutions such as D.A.V. Public School and Ponvidyashram. For healthcare, Prashanth Super Speciality Hospital is a mere 0.2 km from the doorstep.                                                     East Facing Property

                                                    Set in a serene residential enclave of Kallikuppam, this ready-to-move 3 BHK apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort, natural light, and modern community living. The apartment is ideal for families seeking a well-planned home with lake-facing views, ample ventilation, and access to a wide range of amenities.Property SpecificationsSituated on the 14th floor of a 15-storey building, this semi-furnished apartment has a super built-up area of 1629 sq. ft and a carpet area of 1385 sq. ft. The layout comprises three bedrooms and three bathrooms designed for privacy and convenience. Two balconies enhance the living experience, offering calming lake views and natural light. The living and dining area is combined in an L-shaped layout, allowing flexible use of space. The flooring throughout the apartment is a mix of vitrified and ceramic tiles. The modular kitchen is equipped with cabinets and a functional granite platform. The apartment is east-facing and Vaastu compliant, creating a bright and positive living environment.FacilitiesThe apartment comes with one covered parking space. Residents benefit from 24-hour water supply and 100 power backup. Security personnel and CCTV surveillance are installed throughout the premises. The building is equipped with two lifts ensuring smooth access to all floors.AmenitiesResidents enjoy modern lifestyle facilities including a gym, clubhouse, library, auditorium, jogging track, landscaped gardens, park, and childrens play area. A swimming pool is under construction. The society ensures good air circulation and quality water supply.LocalityKallikuppam is a well-established residential neighbourhood in Chennai. Schools are within approximately 1 km, and hospitals are around 3 km. The railway station is 4 km away, and metro connectivity is accessible within 10 km. Daily necessities including supermarkets, banks, and retail outlets are easily reachable. The area enjoys reliable public transport options and smooth commuting.

                                                    Experience the comfort of living in the well-established residential neighbourhood of Jawahar Nagar in Perambur, Chennai. This ready-to-move resale apartment offers a practical blend of accessibility, convenience and peaceful surroundings, making it suitable for homebuyers seeking a secure and well-connected address in the city.Property SpecificationsThis semi-furnished 2 BHK apartment features a super area of 1,148 sq. ft with a well-planned layout that includes two bedrooms, a living area, a functional kitchen and two bathrooms. The unit also offers two balconies that bring in natural light and ventilation while overlooking the pleasant garden or park views. The apartment is situated on the first floor of a four-storey building, making it easily accessible and comfortable for everyday living. The north-west facing orientation further enhances the flow of daylight. The property falls under freehold ownership and has been maintained well over its 15 to 20 years of construction age. Essential structural permissions are in place, and construction for an additional floor is allowed as per the approved norms. The building is supported by a lift for added convenience.FacilitiesResidents benefit from reliable utilities, including a consistent 24-hour water supply and stable electricity with no or rare power cuts. The semi-furnished setup offers essential fittings that support immediate occupancy and easy personalisation. The apartment enjoys a peaceful outlook, facing a garden or park that contributes to a calm living atmosphere. The authority approval from the City Municipal Corporation ensures the property adheres to local development standards.LocalityJawahar Nagar in Perambur is known for its balanced environment that brings together residential comfort, essential amenities and smooth connectivity. The locality is equipped with schools, hospitals, supermarkets, daily convenience stores and public transport facilities, making day-to-day life extremely convenient. Residents benefit from quick access to nearby commercial zones and transport links, ensuring seamless commuting across different parts of Chennai. This makes the apartment an appealing option for families and individuals seeking a home in a mature and well-connected neighbourhood.

                                                    This residence offers a perfect blend of luxury and tranquillity, situated in the burgeoning residential hub of Thiruverkadu. Designed for those who seek an upscale independent lifestyle, this expansive villa provides a serene living environment with modern aesthetics, making it an ideal choice for families who prioritise space, privacy, and comfort.Property SpecificationsThis grand 3 BHK villa spans a generous super area of 2000 sq. ft and is an independent structure built across two levels. The property is currently unfurnished, presenting a versatile canvas for the new owners to design and furnish the interiors according to their personal taste and lifestyle needs. The internal layout is thoughtfully planned to maximise natural light and cross-ventilation, featuring three spacious bedrooms and three modern bathrooms. The villa includes a well-positioned balcony and a terrace that offer pleasant views of the surrounding greenery. With its expansive floor plan and high-quality construction, the residence presents a perfect balance of private retreats and open social spaces.FacilitiesThe property is equipped with a range of essential and premium facilities to ensure a hassle-free and secure lifestyle. Residents benefit from a dedicated covered parking area that can comfortably accommodate private vehicles. A reliable water supply is available, and the property is equipped with a consistent electricity connection. Being an independent villa within a well-maintained community, it offers the luxury of complete privacy while also providing the convenience of a gated environment. The development includes well-paved internal roads and provisions for professional maintenance services for the upkeep of common areas.LocalityStrategically situated in the prime neighbourhood of Thiruverkadu, the property is surrounded by a wealth of amenities and robust infrastructure. The area is exceptionally well-connected to major transit routes, including the Chennai-Bengaluru Highway, ensuring a smooth commute to various parts of the city. Educational requirements are easily met with several reputed schools located within a short distance. For healthcare, multi-specialty hospitals are accessible in the immediate vicinity. Residents also enjoy proximity to local markets, shopping complexes, and dining options, ensuring all daily necessities are within easy reach in this rapidly developing and well-planned suburb.

                                                    Newly Constructed Property

                                                    Discover comfortable and contemporary living in this newly constructed 2 BHK apartment located in the well-connected locality of Manapakkam, Chennai. Set within the thoughtfully planned DAC Manapark project, this ready-to-move home is ideal for families and professionals seeking space, functionality, and everyday convenience in a growing residential neighbourhood.::::::::Property Specifications::::Positioned on the 1st floor of a 5-storey residential building, this unfurnished apartment spans a generous super built-up area of 1,405 sq. ft. The layout comprises two well-proportioned bedrooms and two bathrooms, offering practical living space for modern households. Being newly constructed, the apartment reflects fresh construction quality and allows complete flexibility for buyers to design interiors according to personal preferences. The residence also includes one covered car parking space, ensuring secure and convenient vehicle accommodation.It has 2 covered balconies and 1 private terrace.Its a east facing property::::::::Facilities::::Residents of DAC Manapark benefit from essential and lifestyle-enhancing amenities that support comfortable living. The building is equipped with lift access, power backup, and round-the-clock security, contributing to a safe and hassle-free environment. Additional shared facilities such as a clubhouse and gymnasium enhance the overall residential experience, while reserved parking ensures organised and secure vehicle management. 2 lifts are there.::::::::Locality::::Located in Manapakkam, the apartment enjoys excellent connectivity to major parts of Chennai. Reputed healthcare facilities such as MIOT Hospital are situated close by, while everyday shopping needs are met with retail outlets and supermarkets within easy reach. Educational institutions, including SRM Easwari Engineering College, are nearby, making the location suitable for families and students alike. The area is well-connected via key arterial roads, ensuring smooth access to business hubs in Porur, Guindy, and the wider city. This property presents a well-balanced lifestyle option in a steadily developing residential pocket of Chennai.

                                                    Carpet Area
                                                    1043 sqft
                                                    Status
                                                    Ready to Move
                                                    Transaction
                                                    Resale
                                                    Furnishing
                                                    Semi-Furnished
                                                    facing
                                                    North
                                                    overlooking
                                                    Garden/Park
                                                    Ownership
                                                    Power Of Attorney
                                                    Car Parking
                                                    1 Covered
                                                    Bathroom
                                                    2

                                                    Semi-Furnished Independent House for Sale in Avadi, Chennai::::Set within a well-established residential neighbourhood of Avadi, Chennai, this thoughtfully planned semi-furnished independent house offers comfortable family living with a practical layout and Vaastu-compliant design. The property is north-facing and developed across a ground plus one floor configuration, making it suitable for families seeking a private home with well-defined living spaces and good connectivity to key parts of the city.::::Property Specifications::::The house is constructed in a G plus 1 floor layout and is connected internally through a staircase. The ground floor comprises a drawing room, living room, pooja room, kitchen with dining area, service veranda, and one bedroom with an attached western-style bathroom. The first floor includes one bedroom with an attached bathroom, providing privacy and functional separation of spaces. The total built-up area is approximately 1243 sq. ft, with vitrified tile flooring used uniformly across the house. The property is semi-furnished with wardrobes in the bedrooms and a fully modular kitchen fitted with cabinets, chimney, granite platform, and stainless steel sink. Piped gas connection is available. Both bathrooms are fitted with geysers and modern fixtures. Electrical fittings such as lights and fans are installed throughout the house. There are no balconies in the property.::::Facilities::::The house offers a covered car parking facility for convenient vehicle storage. Power backup is available up to fifty percent, with additional provision for installing an inverter if required. The property does not form part of a gated society and therefore does not include common amenities such as clubhouse or swimming pool. Security services and CCTV installation are not provided, allowing owners the flexibility to implement personalised security solutions as per preference.::::Locality::::Avadi is a well-connected and rapidly developing residential locality in Chennai, offering easy access to schools, healthcare facilities, markets, and transport hubs. Nearby educational institutions include Nasrat School, Velammal Vidhyalaya, Vivekananda Vidhayalaya, Everwin School, and SA Engineering College. Daily necessities can be accessed at Avadi Market and Ponnu Stores, while medical facilities include Avadi Government Hospital and Mehta Hospital. The area is well served by public transport, with Avadi Railway Station and Poonamallee Metro Station providing convenient connectivity across the city and suburbs through buses and trains, ensuring smooth daily commuting.

                                                    As the largest platform connecting property buyers and sellers, Magicbricks boasts over 2 crore monthly visitors and 15 lakh active property listings. With over 17 years of experience, Magicbricks has evolved into a comprehensive service provider, offering home loans, interiors and expert advice.

                                                    Magicbricks also offers extensive research-based knowledge and insight-driven platforms like MBTV, India's leading online real estate YouTube channel, along with proprietary tools providing home buyers with price trends, forecasts and locality reviews.
